com.yahoo.memory

Class Memory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.memory.Memory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    WritableMemory

    public abstract class Memory
extends Object
    Provides read-only primitive and primitive array methods to any of the four resources mentioned at the package level.
    Author:
    Lee Rhodes

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Memory()

      abstract Buffer asBuffer()
      Convert this Memory to a Buffer
      abstract int compareTo(long thisOffsetBytes, long thisLengthBytes, Memory that, long thatOffsetBytes, long thatLengthBytes)
      Compares the bytes of this Memory to that Memory.
      abstract void copyTo(long srcOffsetBytes, WritableMemory destination, long dstOffsetBytes, long lengthBytes)
      Copies bytes from a source range of this Memory to a destination range of the given Memory using the same low-level system copy function as found in System.arraycopy(Object, int, Object, int, int).

      Returns a read only duplicate view of this Memory.

      Returns true if the backing memory is direct (off-heap) memory.

      • map

        public static MemoryMapHandler map(File file)
                            throws Exception
        Allocates direct memory used to memory map files for read operations (including those > 2GB).
        Parameters:
        file - the given file to map
        Returns:
        MemoryMapHandler for managing this map
        Throws:
        Exception - file not found or RuntimeException, etc.

      • map

        public static MemoryMapHandler map(File file,
                                   long fileOffset,
                                   long capacity)
                            throws Exception
        Allocates direct memory used to memory map files for read operations (including those > 2GB).
        Parameters:
        file - the given file to map
        fileOffset - the position in the given file
        capacity - the size of the allocated direct memory
        Returns:
        MemoryMapHandler for managing this map
        Throws:
        Exception - file not found or RuntimeException, etc.

                                     boolean[] dstArray,

        Parameters:
        offsetBytes - offset bytes relative to this Memory start
        dstArray - The preallocated destination array.
        dstOffset - offset in array units
        length - number of array units to transfer

      • compareTo

        public abstract int compareTo(long thisOffsetBytes,
                              long thisLengthBytes,
                              Memory that,
                              long thatOffsetBytes,
                              long thatLengthBytes)
        Compares the bytes of this Memory to that Memory. Returns (this < that) ? -1 : (this > that) ? 1 : 0;. If all bytes are equal up to the shorter of the two lengths, the shorter length is considered to be less than the other.
        Parameters:
        thisOffsetBytes - the starting offset for this Memory
        thisLengthBytes - the length of the region to compare from this Memory
        that - the other Memory to compare with
        thatOffsetBytes - the starting offset for that Memory
        thatLengthBytes - the length of the region to compare from that Memory
        Returns:
        (this < that) ? -1 : (this > that) ? 1 : 0;

      • copyTo

        public abstract void copyTo(long srcOffsetBytes,
                            WritableMemory destination,
                            long dstOffsetBytes,
                            long lengthBytes)
        Copies bytes from a source range of this Memory to a destination range of the given Memory using the same low-level system copy function as found in System.arraycopy(Object, int, Object, int, int).
        Parameters:
        srcOffsetBytes - the source offset for this Memory
        destination - the destination Memory, which may not be Read-Only.
        dstOffsetBytes - the destintaion offset
        lengthBytes - the number of bytes to copy

      • getCapacity

        public abstract long getCapacity()
        Gets the capacity of this Memory in bytes
        Returns:
        the capacity of this Memory in bytes

      • getCumulativeOffset

        public abstract long getCumulativeOffset(long offsetBytes)
        Returns the cumulative offset in bytes of this Memory including the given offsetBytes.
        Parameters:
        offsetBytes - the given offset in bytes
        Returns:
        the cumulative offset in bytes of this Memory including the given offsetBytes.

        public abstract boolean hasArray()
        Returns true if this Memory is backed by an on-heap primitive array
        Returns:
        true if this Memory is backed by an on-heap primitive array

        public abstract boolean hasByteBuffer()
        Returns true if this Memory is backed by a ByteBuffer
        Returns:

      • isDirect

        public abstract boolean isDirect()
        Returns true if the backing memory is direct (off-heap) memory.
        Returns:
        true if the backing memory is direct (off-heap) memory.

      • isResourceReadOnly

        public abstract boolean isResourceReadOnly()
        Returns true if the backing resource is read only
        Returns:
        true if the backing resource is read only

      • isValid

        public abstract boolean isValid()
        Returns true if this Memory is valid() and has not been closed.
        Returns:
        true if this Memory is valid() and has not been closed.

      • toHexString

        public abstract String toHexString(String header,
                                   long offsetBytes,
                                   int lengthBytes)
        Returns a formatted hex string of a range of this Memory. Used primarily for testing.
        Parameters:
        header - descriptive header
        offsetBytes - offset bytes relative to this Memory start
        lengthBytes - number of bytes to convert to a hex string
        Returns:
        a formatted hex string in a human readable array
